name: tbs
description: Time beacon sharding, a Layer2 Blockchain Defeating the Scalability Trilemma.

scripts.deps: depcruise --include-only "^src" --output-type dot src | dot -T svg > architecture.svg
scripts.size: t="$(npm pack .)"; wc -c "${t}"; tar tvf "${t}"; rm "${t}";
scripts.stage: git add . && git commit -m "$npm_package_version" && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags
